description: This script provides functions to connect to a MongoDB database, count seeded documents, and remove seeded sample data based on a specific seed tag. It includes main execution logic to perform the clearing process.

methods.name: _get_db
methods.description: Establishes and returns a MongoDB database connection using settings.

methods.name: _counts
methods.description: Counts documents with a specific seed_tag in users, content, and assessments collections.

methods.name: clear_seeded
methods.description: Deletes documents seeded with a specific seed_tag from the database, without dropping collections or indexes.

methods.name: _main_async
methods.description: Main asynchronous function to perform pre- and post-clear seed counts and print results.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Runs the asynchronous main function using asyncio.run.
